QueryDefinition.Query: SELECT t.observation_id , t.person_id , t.observation_concept_id , t.observation_date , t.observation_datetime , t.observation_type_concept_id , t.value_as_number , t.value_as_string , t.value_as_concept_id , t.qualifier_concept_id , t.unit_concept_id , t.provider_id , t.visit_occurrence_id , t.visit_detail_id , t.observation_source_value , t.observation_source_concept_id , t.unit_source_value , t.qualifier_source_value , t.value_source_value , t.observation_event_id , t.obs_event_field_concept_id , ch.PartitionId FROM {sc}.observation as t JOIN {ch_sc}._chunks ch ON ch.ChunkId = {0} AND t.PERSON_ID = ch.PERSON_ID order by ch.PartitionId, t.person_id
